name: HSP_CLAIM_XR_DISP
description: This table contains the information used to display the details of calculations performed by contract pricing extensions when calculating expected reimbursement.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: XR_DISP_LINE_NUM
columns.description: The line number to be displayed in the expected reimbursement detail of the Hospital Billing liability bucket.  May include other characters for aid in display formatting.

columns.name: XR_DISP_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The explanatory or descriptive text to be displayed in the Hospital Billing Liability Bucket detail. This may be the description of a calculated quantity, which may include the arithmetic used in the calculation. It can also be the header used to label a section of the reimbursement calculation.

columns.name: XR_DISP_AMT
columns.description: The amount calculated or other values for a line in the expected reimbursement detail of the Hospital Billing liability bucket.
